bibl.title: Imperial Female Hairstyles on Alexandrian Tetradrachms of the 3rd Century A.D.
bibl.note: Treats the development of female hairstyles on Alexandrian tetradrachms during the period of the so called ""Soldier Emperors"", from Maximinus Thrax to Carinus (235-285 A.D.).
bibl.seg: Lucas Michaelis, Imperial Female Hairstyles on Alexandrian Tetradrachms of the 3rd Century A.D.
Treats the development of female hairstyles on Alexandrian tetradrachms during the period of the so called ""Soldier Emperors"", from Maximinus Thrax to Carinus (235-285 A.D.).
